name: was it just a dream
description:
You find yourself in a world filled with obstacles; sometimes, it's impossible to pass. You close your eyes and find an easier route, but spectral figures haunt and follow you. You comfort yourself with a blanket of safety and carry along. 

After all, it is not real.

Was It Just a Dream 

A game by Chris Karpyszyn built in less than seven days for the Brackeys 2022.1 Game Jam.

Use A and D keys to move and Space to jump. Use the portals to navigate impossible platforms. Avoid spikes. Runaway from ghosts. Capture safety tokens to destroy the ghosts.

Some Links

Come hang out in my twitch stream. 

Let's collaborate together and chat about game development on my Discord Server

Help me make the game better and Report a Bug on GitHub

Credits

https://gamechops.com/deltarune-vibes/ - The music used in this game is a Creative Commons song called My Castle Town by Helynt off the album Deltarune Vibes. Thank you for creating great music to help improve the atmosphere of my game. 

https://brackeys.com/ - Various assets were procured for free from
